modName: bigger equipable erect penis for Favored Soul Meshes
summary: A bigger equipable penis for Favored Soul Meshes :)
descriptionHtml:
This is a  modification of  Nudes male FavoredSoulMeshes mod, and all credits are the same.

REQUIRE the texture of  \"Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion\"
LINK:   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
=========================================================================
12 Jan 2013 update to 2.0

Include a new esp.If you don\'t want to use the old version,you can deactive the old esp and only active the new one.

Or you can active the both esp and you can use the two versions at the same time.

Get them in the same location of RiverWood.

This version remove all kind of pen** of old version,only keep the penis_45L one and  it\'s be modified(move the location of the penis a little down on the malebody),also add two other kinds of penis,make the 3 types looks like  one penis in the different time:D

=========================================================================
3 October 2012 update to 1.1
remove the monster size penis and add a penis which has more realistic size and shape.The other type of penis is kept so there are still two kind of penis you can get:)


=========================================================================
Someone said the size is too large,so I added a little smaller size(still big enough,though...).It\'s hard to make it smaller because if it\'s too small,you would see a hole between your legs when you move or jump.

You can get the both sizes,just get the one you like
============================================================

How to use this mod:

1.Download \"Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion\".Then drag the \'Textures\' directory of the \"Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion\" into your Skyrim Data.

(NOTICE!! Don\'t drag the  \'Meshes\' directory into your Skyrim Data if you don\'t want to see your enemy\'s erect penis when you killed him and take off his clothe:D)


2.Install this mod and active the \'PENIS.esp\' file.

3.Run the game and you can find the \"penis\" in a barrel in Riverwood.
author: yukikaze
